title: Bug?
body:
Not sure if this is a bug but it's not serious in my eyes if it is. But when you go on to another persons profile you can't see there champions they have. But since last patch if I am on another persons profile and I quickly go to my profile and click champions tab it will load theirs up instead of mine. 
While I dont see this as a big deal but I think riot might as they don't allow it in the first place. 
I have only been able to do this since the patch and have tried successfully with many people to see if It was just a one off.

replies.body: its defs a bug, just blame riots spaghetti code.
